New_Brunswick.Steep Hill Brook (New Jersey):
Steep Hill Brook is a tributary of Six Mile Run in central and north central Franklin Park, Somerset County, New Jersey in the United States.


== Course ==
Steep Hill Brook's source is at 40°29′43″N 74°32′41″W, in a pond near the intersection of Amwell Road and Van Cleef Road. It starts in Scott Farm, a local farm bordering Van Cleef Road and Amwell Road.
